title.rendered: JORI PAPA London based shoe brand launched new fun styles

content.rendered:
Jori Papa shoes are colorful, stylish and full of personality. Finding inspiration in beautiful exotic birds and interpreting a birds eye motif onto her shoes and captivating red poppy flower details and African tribal body painting.

Born in Albania and with a Mediterranean vibe in her blood, Jori accepts that style plays an important part in her life. She recalls her childhood memories sketching fashion outfits and shoes in secret during the long summer afternoons, while her grandma believed little Jori was having a nap.

Growing up and being unconsciously dragged towards the creative process, she used to spend hours watching fashion channel and imagining herself being the creator of those catwalks outfits. The debut collection features eight stunning designs offering a variety of silhouettes and colors, there is a style for everyone.

The unique shapes and fluid lines with playful feminine cut out details are bound to bring excitement to any look.

Loved by AJ Odudu and seen in ELLE and Wonderland Magazine, Jori has developed into a brand to keep an eye on! Jori Papa shoes are available online, at Wolf & Badger, Lone Design Club and Cult Mia.
